notes: This report describes preliminary building damage analysis carried out by UNITAR-UNOSAT covering Area 1 (Jeremie and Roseaux Commune) and Area 2 (Abricot, Dame-Marie, Anse d’Hainaults and Les Irois Communes) for a total area of approximately 650 Km2. Building damage analysis, including a rapid assessment of transportation network conditions and locations of spontaneous people gathering sites, was conducted by comparing the post-disaster satellite images (Pleiades acquired on 7/10/2016 for AOI1 and 12/10/2016 for AOI2) with available pre-disaster images (WorldView-1 on 01/05/2015, 09/05/2015 and 08/12/2014; Worldview-2 on 17 July 2016).
